content:
ListChangedType Enum

Definition

Specifies how the list changed.

In this Article

public enum ListChangedType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ListChangedType

Examples

For an example of using this class, see Handling DataView Events.

Remarks

Used by the ListChangedType property of the ListChangedEventArgs class to indicate the way an IBindingList object changes.

Fields

ItemAdded

An item added to the list. stem.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex* contains the index of the item that was added.
ItemChanged

An item changed in the list. stem.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex* contains the index of the item that was changed.
ItemDeleted

An item deleted from the list. stem.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex* contains the index of the item that was deleted.
ItemMoved

An item moved within the list. stem.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.OldIndex* contains the previous index for the item, whereas stem.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.NewIndex* contains the new index for the item.
PropertyDescriptorAdded

A PropertyDescriptor was added, which changed the schema.
PropertyDescriptorChanged

A PropertyDescriptor was changed, which changed the schema.
PropertyDescriptorDeleted

A PropertyDescriptor was deleted, which changed the schema.
Reset

Much of the list has changed. Any listening controls should refresh all their data from the list.
